69250.「オレは パルノ。\n 迷える旅人たちに 運命の一着を授ける\n さすらいの レ:
I am... I'm a wanderer who rents clothes to give lost travelers the clothes of their dreams... ...... My wardrobe will only open
when my destiny is fulfilled. I'll just have to wait until that time comes.

69252.「レンタル衣装を 借りたいんだな？\n じゃあ どの衣装を借りるか 選んでくれ。:
So, you want to rent a costume? Well, you can
choose which costume you'd like to rent...

69253.「<%sM_item>を レンタルすると\n こんな感じになるぜ？\n この衣装:
This is what the <%sM_item>
looks like. You want to rent it?
<yesno><close>

69254.「お <%sM_item2>を 持っているのか。\n それがあれば １日の間 無:
Oh, I have a <%sM_item2>... If you have it, I
can lend you this costume for free for a day,
but do you need it now?<yesno><close>

69255.「<%nM_num>日レンタルだと レンタル料は\n <%nM_gold>ゴール:
If you rent for <%nM_num> days, the rental
fee will be <%nM_gold> gold, is that okay
with you?<yesno><close>

69256.「<%sM_item>の レンタル料は\n １日あたり <%nM_gold>ゴー:
<%sM_item> rental fee per day <%nM_gold>
goal... Can you decide how many days you want
to rent for?

69257.「<%sM_item3>を 持っているんだな。\n それを使えば <%sM_it:
I have <%sM_item3>... If you use it, you can
borrow <%sM_item> for free for a day... You
want to use <%sM_item3>?<yesno><close>

69258.「よし。じゃあ チケットは\n ここで もらっておくぜ。: Okay. Then you can get your ticket here...

69259.「それじゃあ またな 旅人よ。心だけは\n いつも クールに はばたかせてくれ！:
I'll see you later... Just keep your mind
cool and fluttery.

69262.「オレは さすらいのレンタル衣装屋 パルノ。\n 迷える旅人よ。今日は なんの用:
I'm Parno, and this is my wandering Rental
Shop. What can I do for you today, my lost
traveler?
<break>

69265.「<%sM_item>をレンタル中だな。\n 他の衣装を借りるなら 今借りてる衣:
Renting <%sM_item>... If you rent another
costume, you'll have to return the one you're
currently renting, but you'll still rent it?<yesno><close>

69266.「レンタル衣装は 借りると元の装備の性能のまま\n 見た目だけを 他では 絶対に:
A rental costume is a dream outfit that allows you to keep your original equipment, but change your appearance to something super
cool you can't get anywhere else. Rentals are for one day at a time, up to nine... When the rental period is over, the costume is
automatically returned to you, so there's no need to come here. Once you've rented a costume, you can take it off and put it back
on at any time... Of course, the rental fee is different for each outfit.

69267.「オーケー！ 商談成立だ！\n レンタルした衣装は 『そうび』画面から\n いつ:
Okay! We have a deal! You can take off and
put on your rented costume at any time from
the "Play" screen!

69827.「<%sM_item>は チケット制の衣装だ。\n ハロウィン衣装券があれば 何:
<%sM_item> is a ticketed... If you have a Halloween costume ticket, you can rent it as many times as you want... The rental period
is 9... Do you want to rent this <%sM_item>?

69829.「<%sM_item>は 人気の衣装でな。\n 期間は １日限定。レンタル料は\:
<%sM_item> is a popular clothing... Duration:
1... The rental fee will be <%nM_gold> gold,
do you want to rent it?<yesno><close>

69846.「オレは パルノ。\n 迷える旅人たちに 運命の一着を授ける\n さすらいの レ:
I am... I am a wandering renter of clothes who gives lost travelers the chance to find their destiny. I am the wandering renter...
My wardrobe will only be opened when my destiny is fulfilled! But now it seems that time has come! If you rent a costume from
this rental shop, you'll be able to change your appearance to something super cool, while maintaining the performance of your
original equipment! So, lost... What can I do for you today?

87210.「今日から 過去に一度でも入手した衣装は\n 対応したチケットがなくても いつで:
Starting today, you'll be able to rent any costume you've ever owned, even if you don't have the corresponding ticket. Of course, if
you bring the corresponding ticket, it's free, but even if you don't have a ticket, you can still rent it for a fee. If you have
any unused tickets in your closet, this is a good opportunity to use them... I'm lost... What can I do for you today?
